definition: short name for Sichuan 四川[Si4 chuan1] province/one of the Three Kingdoms 三國|三国[San1 guo2] after the Han dynasty, also called 蜀漢|蜀汉[Shu3 Han4], situated around what is now Sichuan province
net (Kangxi radical 122)
Shushan district of Hefei city 合肥市[He2 fei2 shi4], Anhui
Sichuan/originally two provinces of Qin and Han
Shushan district of Hefei city 合肥市[He2 fei2 shi4], Anhui
Shu Han (c. 200-263), Liu Bei's kingdom in Sichuan during the Three Kingdoms, claiming legitimacy as successor of Han
indulge in pleasure and forget home and duty (idiom)
Sichuan embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being 蘇繡|苏绣[Su1 xiu4], 湘繡|湘绣[Xiang1 xiu4] and 粵繡|粤绣[Yue4 xiu4])
brocade from Sichuan
lit. covet Sichuan once Gansu has been seized/fig. endless greed/insatiable desire
hollyhock (Alcea rosea)
corn
lit. Sichuan dogs bark at the sun (idiom); fig. a simpleton will marvel at even the most common things/alludes to the Sichuan foggy weather where it's uncommon to see a sunny day
mountains and rivers of Sichuan (idiom)
see 怪叔叔[guai4 shu1 shu5]
Luxor, city in Egypt (Cantonese transliteration)
the Qinling plank road to Shu, a historical mountain road from Shaanxi to Sichuan

sentences.english: That's why Yu-Fu Era is considered as the transfer time of ancient Shu.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见鱼凫时代为古蜀社会转型期。

sentences.english: The second is the flourish of whole culture art in west Shu.
sentences.chinese: 第二是西蜀整个文化艺术的繁荣。

sentences.english: The worship of the sun and the moon can be demonstrated from the sunbird and frog-shaped ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 太阳神鸟与蛙形器体现了古蜀人日月崇拜的观念。

sentences.english: "Holy Mountain Worship"has important influence on ancient Shu civilization.
sentences.chinese: 而“圣山崇拜”对古蜀文明有相当大的影响。

sentences.english: This made the officers and soldiers in the city really believe that Jiang Wei's surrender to Shu State was true.
sentences.chinese: 守城官兵更认定姜维降蜀是事实了。

sentences.english: Lapping the mountain foot, spring waters flow.
Jinsha relic, the cradle of the Shu Culture, is the oldest site in Chengdu.
sentences.chinese: 金沙遗址，蜀文化的摇篮，是成都最古老的遗址。

sentences.english: Jade Zhang was typical ritual utensil in Shu culture.
sentences.chinese: 玉璋是古蜀重要的祭祀礼器。

sentences.english: Having teachers visit us from Bashu school has improved our school and given us more opportunities for the children.
sentences.chinese: 这次到蜀小学访问给了我们的孩子们更多机会。

sentences.english: His entering Sichuan had had a great impact on this exact region.
sentences.chinese: 张咏的入蜀，对巴蜀地域产生了较大的影响。

sentences.english: Xiashu Loess is a kind of geographical special soil in Zhenjiang area.
sentences.chinese: 下蜀黄土是镇江地区广泛分布的一种特殊性土层。

sentences.english: Libing, a governor of Shu in the Qin state, created the system.
sentences.chinese: 李冰在担任秦国蜀郡守期间修建了这个水利系统。
苍翠繁茂的玉黍蜀田人。

sentences.english: Shu base also heard the story of two monks do?
sentences.chinese: 还听说过蜀鄙二僧的故事吗？

sentences.english: This is a story from Three Kingdoms. Huang Zhong, a veteran in the army of Shu, was one of its top five generals.
sentences.chinese: 黄忠是蜀军中有名的老将。

sentences.english: This is a story from Three Kingdoms. Huang Zhong， a veteran in the army of Shu， was one of its top five generals.
sentences.chinese: 黄忠是蜀军中有名的老将。

name of old state in modern Sichuan

Cheng Han of the Sixteen Kingdoms (304-347)

Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

short name for Gansu province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
